channel.title: Status on resticprofile
channel.description: Recent content in Status on resticprofile

item.title: Prometheus
item.description: resticprofile can generate a prometheus file, or send the report to a push gateway. For now, only a backup command will generate a report. Here’s a configuration example with both options to generate a file and send to a push gateway: toml yaml hcl json [root] inherit = "default" prometheus-save-to-file = "root.prom" prometheus-push = "http://localhost:9091/" [root.backup] extended-status = true no-error-on-warning = true source = [ "/" ] root: inherit: default prometheus-save-to-file: "root.
